text: Albert Zafy (1 May 1927Patrick Rajoelina, Madagascar, le duel (2003), page 206 . – 13 October 2017) was a Malagasy politician. He was the President of Madagascar from 27 March 1993Richard R. Marcus, "Political change in Madagascar: populist democracy or neopatrimonialism by another name?" , Institute for Security Studies, Occasional Paper 89, August 2004. to 5 September 1996.Guy Arnold, Madagascar: Year in Review 1996, Britannica.com. Zafy died on 13 October 2017 at a hospital in Saint-Pierre, Réunion in France of a stroke at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Presidents of Madagascar Category:Physicians
title: Albert Zafy
